channel.title: Psyched for Dark Souls 2 Anyone?
channel.description:
Hey all! As you may or may not know, the next game in the Souls series is coming out in March of 2014 I believe. This is the third game in the series and from what I've seen on youtube, it looks AMAZING.
Do any of you guys play Demon's/Dark Souls? If so, leave a comment telling me of your favorite weapon in either game, your favorite of the two games, and what you are looking for in Dark Souls 2!

item.title: Psyched for Dark Souls 2 Anyone?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Precisely, I have to admit, my first playthrough ended up in me not playing the game again for a few months. Then I decided to give it another shot, so I watched a guy on youtube “NorthernLion” do his playthrough as a Wanderer. From then on I began to get the gist of the game. It does require dedication but at my prime in the game, playing it gave me the feeling of nirvana

Read full topic

item.title: Psyched for Dark Souls 2 Anyone?
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

I know a few friends who have hundreds of hours into it, but they said their first playthrough was hard. I know online people can leave clues and things like that to help others through the game (or so I was told).

Read full topic

item.title: Psyched for Dark Souls 2 Anyone?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

I can explain it as absolute hell if you’re looking for a definition
Just kidding, but I have absolutely no clue how people can play such a tough, rigid game (by rigid I mean it gives you absolutely no insight into any solutions to any problems whatsoever).
I find it impressive that people actually have the dedication to do that shit

Read full topic

item.title: Psyched for Dark Souls 2 Anyone?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Dark souls isnt explainable, its an experience.

Read full topic

Anyone wanna explain Dark Souls to me? No I won’t look it up.

item.title: Psyched for Dark Souls 2 Anyone?
item.dc:creator: @Vexx Vexx
item.description:
@Vexx wrote:

I have about 450 hours on DkS, it’s probably one of my favorite games. Even though I am looking forward to Dark Souls 2, I am kind of disappointed from some of the gameplay I have seen.

Read full topic

item.title: Psyched for Dark Souls 2 Anyone?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

It is such a fun game. The reason why most people hate it is because at the beginning, when you are VERY unfamiliar with the game, the game is very difficult, however, once you have beaten the game once or twice you will find everything very easy which is why they added NG+, or “you get to restart the game after beating it but the enemies are 2x harder”. This goes on indefinitely

Read full topic

item.title: Psyched for Dark Souls 2 Anyone?
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

I know a couple people who want it and play Dark Souls, but I have no clue what it is.
